mapper.select: SELECT A.name AS 이름 ,A.organization AS 회사 ,A.job_title AS 직위 ,A.phone AS 전화번호 ,A.email AS 이메일 ,A.login_id AS 로그인ID ,A.login_password AS 로그인암호 ,A.authorization_id AS 권한관리ID ,B.name AS 권한관리명 ,A.sign_up_at AS 가입일시 FROM user A LEFT OUTER JOIN authorization B ON A.authorization_id = B.id WHERE 1=1 AND A.login_id = #{로그인ID}
